title: Temuri Shonia
text:
Temuri Shonia (; born 28 May 1990) is a <a href="Georgia%20%28country%29">Georgian</a> <a href="association%20football">football</a> player, currently playing for <a href="FC%20Locomotive%20Tbilisi">FC Locomotive Tbilisi</a>.
Club career.
Shonia began his career in <a href="FC%20Spartaki%20Tskhinvali">Spartaki Tskhinvali</a>. He later moved to <a href="FC%20Dinamo%20Batumi">Dinamo Batumi</a> and is now the captain of the club. He has been a regular member of the Georgia's youth national sides.
International.
He made his debut for the <a href="Georgia%20national%20football%20team">Georgia national football team</a> on 23 January 2017 in a friendly against <a href="Uzbekistan%20national%20football%20team">Uzbekistan</a>, scoring one of the two goals of the team.
